attributes.action: Reverse the recent increase to university tuition fees in England
attributes.additional_details: We demand that the government reverses the recent increase in the amount universities can charge for tuition and reintroduces the previous £3000 ceiling. The current level of £9000 will undoubtedly discourage those from lower income families from attending university, and will saddle those that do go with levels of debt that will have a negative influence upon their future life decisions. It will also force people to study vocational subjects and stop people from lower income families from studying arts related degrees.
